question: You would like to be work in a different city to be closer to your family. Write a letter to your employer to request a transfer to another office. In the letter:- Explain why you would like to move- Request that your employer place you in a specific city- Request that it be completed by a certain dateWrite at least 150 words.
text: I am writing this letter to request you to place me in our Mumbai office. The plea is to closely watch my sister's health who is currently diagnosed with  blood cancer. She has been prescribed  certain medications to be taken timely and to undergo numerous chemotherapies. My parents, being old, cannot take this stress solely.

I understand you admire my work and rely on my skills for your day-to-day activities, but I assure to finish all my tasks before I wind up from this place. Not only this but also I will always be available at your disposal even after my placement in another city. Hence this is my earnest request to shift me internally from the Dubai office to Mumbai headquarters. If this comes to a fruition, I will no longer be required to search for a new job to look after my sister during her tough time.
Lastly, I need to finish the transfer process by the 30th of August so that I can start the hospital visits with her.  Assuring my best always.

error_list.error_des: It seems that there is an article usage problem here.
The indefinite article, a, may be redundant when used with the uncountable noun fruition in your sentence. Consider removing it.
